resources.string: Lack of something to feel important about is almost the greatest tragedy a man may have.
You dont get to live a bad life and have good things happen to you.
We’re people in a world that don’t want us no more.
Some jobs arent for saving and some legacies are for pissing on.
We can’t change whats done, we can only move on.
Just do one thing or the other, don’t try to be two people at once…
Look, Im sorry friend. I can barely speak English.
